meanings.definition: With the feet foremost or in front.
meanings.sent1: She jumped feetfirst into the pool.
meanings.sent2: He always enters a room feetfirst, eager to explore.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy clown tripped feetfirst over his own shoelaces.
meanings.sent4: The fearless explorer dove feetfirst into the unknown cave.
meanings.sent5: The superhero landed feetfirst, ready to save the day.

meanings.definition: In a manner with the feet leading the way.
meanings.sent1: The dancer glided feetfirst across the stage.
meanings.sent2: The hiker tackled the steep trail feetfirst, careful with each step.
meanings.sent3: The penguin waddled feetfirst, looking quite comical.
meanings.sent4: The athlete sprinted feetfirst towards the finish line.
meanings.sent5: The detective followed the footprints feetfirst, tracking the suspect.
